Randy Gibbons

Position: 
Councilmember Place 1
Term End Date: 
May, 2027
Email: 
randy.gibbons@hickorycreek-tx.gov

Randy Gibbons has worked for Southwest Airlines for almost 24 years and is currently working as the Sr. Manager of Payment Strategies and Risk in Treasury.  He is responsible for executing the Companyâ€™s consumer payment vision across all products, channels and currencies.  Randy previously served 6 years on the Corinth City Council before moving to Hickory Creek in 2015.  He currently serves on the Steeplechase HOA Board of Directors and served over 9 years as Board President of his previous HOA.  Randy is passionate about serving his community and trying to make a difference for his family.  He loves spending time with his family and working with computers in his spare time.  Randy is honored to serve in a leadership capacity in his local Church and minister to people in their time of need.
